Name: Nude In The Castle
About the game: Nude In The Castle is a third person game where you play as a sexy girl who is trying to save her castle from perverts. Armed with a sharp ax, cut and kill the dirty perverts who have captured this castle. In this game, you will have to play as a naked girl who desperately wants to take back the castle from a bunch of dirty perverts. Armed with an ax, cut these bastards right and left! You also have the opportunity to pick up potions that strengthen you. There is a potion of invisibility, super speed, big jump and mega damage!!! After killing 150 perverts, you will fight a deadly boss. Be careful, he is incredibly dangerous and selenium. Kill the pervert boss!!! Game Features: Cool music and cool atmosphere! Catchy, intuitive gameplay! Incredibly beautiful naked girl! Very beautiful graphics! Incredibly difficult boss!
